courage.c1: I can handle whatever today brings with calm and courage.
courage.c2: I have done hard things before; I can do them again.
courage.c3: I am brave, authentic and proactive, and believe in my skills and experience.
courage.c4: I am not guided and controlled by fear. I carry it forward and show it the way
courage.c5: I know fear is a sensation I can tune into and I understand where it comes from
courage.c7: I am not my thoughts, I am what I do.
courage.c8: I can always be humble and dignified. I cannot control the respect, appreciation, authenticity of others.
courage.c10: Every action I take and every person I speak to is getting me one step closer.
courage.c11: I have value. I take action to solve. I lead the outcome.

positivity.p1: I don’t entertain negative thoughts that don’t nourish and sustain me
positivity.p2: Today is full of small opportunities to move things forward.
positivity.p3: I don't worry about the things I cannot control.
positivity.p4: I am grateful every day for the love I have around me
positivity.p8: I am confident that the universe is reflecting back on me that I am on the right track, so everything is in order.
positivity.p10: I expect nothing and accept everything
positivity.p11: I will always choose kindness, to myself or others.
positivity.p12: I am committed to knowing who I am, where I have come from and what I stand for.
positivity.p13: I will be the best I can be in the life I am living now

appreciation.a1: I appreciate the love of my family.
appreciation.a2: I appreciate the tribes that help me.
appreciation.a4: I appreciate the effort I put in to finding the gateways to opportunities.
appreciation.a5: I appreciate my lessons and my resilience.
appreciation.a8: I appreciate the joy from my learnings.
appreciation.a9: I’m thankful for the times I choose kindness, to myself or others.
appreciation.a10: I appreciate my commitment to want to be better
appreciation.a12: I appreciate the future I’m quietly building for myself.
appreciation.a13: You need to love the life you live, not the one you might have expected to have.
